snippet: The series has morphed into a taut and tense prizefight between two like-minded opponents who never lost faith in their ability to beat each other up.
abstract: Chicago Bulls and Brooklyn Nets prepare for decisive Game 7 of their hard-fought and dramatic first-round playoff series.

byline.original: By ZACH SCHONBRUN and BEN STRAUSS
byline.contributor: Zach Schonbrun reported from New York and Ben Strauss from Chicago.

lead_paragraph: The series has morphed into a taut and tense prizefight between two like-minded opponents who never lost faith in their ability to beat each other up.

headline.seo: As Nets and Bulls Go the Distance, the First Round Feels Like the 15th
headline.main: As Nets and Bulls Go the Distance, the First Round Feels Like the 15th
headline.print_headline: As Nets and Bulls Go the Distance, the First Round Feels Like the 15th
